chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_152
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
amination
 - Nutrition and Family planning Counselling 
 - Lab investigations
 ∙ Help the women to plan and prepare for birth (Birth preparedness/micro birth plan).
 ∙ Identify and track the high-risk pregnant women and counsel them to go for regular anti natal check-ups at 
PHC by medical officer.
 ∙ Follow up of HRP to ensure institutional delivery.
 ∙ Mapping of all referral sites for institutional delivery and management of complications.
 ∙ Educate the PW/family members about signs of labou
